mapper.sql: STU_ID, CRD_ID, EDU_TYPE_ID, STU_NAME, STU_NICK, STU_SEX, STU_UNIV_COLG, STU_MAJOR, STU_FACE, STU_PASS, STU_PHONE, STU_WEIXIN, STU_QQ, STU_EMAIL, ACTIVATION_TIME, INVALID_DATE
mapper.select: select STU_ID, stu.CRD_ID, EDU_TYPE_ID, STU_NAME, STU_NICK, STU_SEX, STU_UNIV_COLG, STU_MAJOR, STU_FACE, STU_PASS, STU_PHONE, STU_WEIXIN, STU_QQ, STU_EMAIL, ACTIVATION_TIME, INVALID_DATE ,sc.CRD_SN from student stu inner join study_card sc on stu.CRD_ID = sc.CRD_ID where sc.CRD_SN = #{stuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into student (STU_ID, CRD_ID, EDU_TYPE_ID, STU_NAME, STU_NICK, STU_SEX, STU_UNIV_COLG, STU_MAJOR, STU_FACE, STU_PASS, STU_PHONE, STU_WEIXIN, STU_QQ, STU_EMAIL, ACTIVATION_TIME, INVALID_DATE) values (#{stuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eduTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuUnivColg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuFace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuWeixin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activationTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{invalidDate,jdbcType=DATE})

mapper.update:
update student
CRD_ID = #{crdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EDU_TYPE_ID = #{eduTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_NAME = #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_NICK = #{stuNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_SEX = #{stuSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_UNIV_COLG = #{stuUnivColg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_MAJOR = #{stuMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_FACE = #{stuFace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_PASS = #{stuPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_PHONE = #{stuPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_WEIXIN = #{stuWeixin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_QQ = #{stuQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_EMAIL = #{stuEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTIVATION_TIME = #{activationTime,jdbcType=DATE},
INVALID_DATE = #{invalidDate,jdbcType=DATE},
where STU_ID = #{stuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update student set CRD_ID = #{crdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDU_TYPE_ID = #{eduTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_NAME = #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_NICK = #{stuNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_SEX = #{stuSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_UNIV_COLG = #{stuUnivColg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_MAJOR = #{stuMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_FACE = #{stuFace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_PASS = #{stuPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_PHONE = #{stuPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_WEIXIN = #{stuWeixin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_QQ = #{stuQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_EMAIL = #{stuEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVATION_TIME = #{activationTime,jdbcType=DATE}, INVALID_DATE = #{invalidDate,jdbcType=DATE} where STU_ID = #{stuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
